aboutPage.mainSubtitle: Your Ultimate Movie and TV Series Companion

missionStory.title: Our Mission & Story
missionStory.p1: ChillyMovies was born from a passion for cinema and television, and a desire to create a seamless, enjoyable experience for discovering, organizing, and accessing your favorite content. We aim to provide a premium, user-friendly platform that respects your preferences and puts you in control.
missionStory.p2: Our journey is one of continuous improvement, driven by community feedback and the evolving landscape of digital entertainment. We're committed to building a tool that's not just functional, but a joy to use.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.description: Here's what makes ChillyMovies stand out:
featuresList: Extensive Library: Discover movies and TV series from a vast, up-to-date catalog.
Advanced Search & Filtering: Find exactly what you're looking for with powerful search and intuitive filters by genre, year, and origin.
Instant Streaming: Watch movies and TV series directly in your browser with our integrated player.
Detailed Information: Access comprehensive details, trailers, cast, and recommendations for every title.
Personalized Experience: Customize theme accents and streaming preferences.
Responsive Design: Enjoy a seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices.
Bilingual Support: Currently supporting English and Swahili for a wider audience.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: New to ChillyMovies? Here’s how to get started quickly:

steps.title: Explore
steps.content: Browse popular movies and TV series on the Home page, or use the Discover sections for Movies and TV Series with filters.

steps.title: Search
steps.content: Use the live search bar in the sidebar to quickly find specific titles.

steps.title: Stream
steps.content: On any movie or TV series page, click the 'Play' button to start streaming instantly.

steps.title: Customize
steps.content: Personalize your theme and streaming preferences in the Settings page.

versionNext.title: Version & What's Next
versionNext.roadmapP1: We're constantly working to enhance ChillyMovies. Here are some features we're excited about for future releases:
roadmapItems: User accounts and synchronization across devices.
Enhanced recommendation engine based on viewing history.
Offline viewing options (if feasible and legal).
More robust community features and discussions.
versionNext.stayTuned: Stay tuned for updates and new features!

techAttributions.title: Technology & Attributions
techAttributions.intro: ChillyMovies is built using a variety of modern web technologies. We also rely on and are grateful for the following APIs and libraries:

techList.value: React framework for server-side rendering and static site generation.
The Movie Database for movie and TV series metadata.
For server-side torrent handling to enable streaming.
For a clean and consistent icon set.

techAttributions.outro: This project is for educational and demonstration purposes. Please respect copyright laws and support content creators by subscribing to legal streaming services and purchasing content.
